Description: Polychrome painted and gilded cartonnage covering for the foot section of a mummy, there is a vertical register of hieroglyphs between the feet, which are surmounted by figures of the Anubis jackal (from the same mummy as the head covering - 29472).
Bibliographic references: Stuttgart 2007 / Ägyptische Mumien : Unsterblichkeit im Land der Pharaonen (no. 219)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1990-2003, Frankfurt, Naturmuseum Senckenberg, long term loan 2007-2008 6 Oct-24 Mar, Stuttgart, Württemberg State Museum, Agyptische Mumien: Botschafter aus dem Land der Pharaonen
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
